text:
This issue not a big deal if only one pattern string is specific, but it could 
make a difference if more are specified.

This method creates a new String from the response char array for each pattern 
to be checked.  As far as I can tell, it really should be pulled out of the 
loop.

Thanks!

Jonathan Carlson
Minneapolis Minnesota
creator: jacarlso@katun.com

Resolving as FIXED.
